entry.title: Windowsä»»åŠ¡æ åŸºé‡‘æ’ä»¶
entry.content:
ä¹‹å‰å†™äº†ä¸€ä¸ªè‹¹æœçš„åŸºé‡‘å‡€å€¼æ’ä»¶ï¼Œæœ‰éœ€è¦çš„å¯ä»¥çœ‹çœ‹xbar/BitBaråŸºé‡‘å‡€å€¼æ’ä»¶ ï¼Œè¿™æ¬¡å†™äº†ä¸€ä¸ªPythonçš„å°æ’ä»¶ï¼Œæ”¾åœ¨ä»»åŠ¡æ ä¸Šï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±èƒ½å¤Ÿéšæ—¶æŸ¥çœ‹ä½ çš„åŸºé‡‘äº†ã€‚

æ›´æ–°åŠŸèƒ½

æœ¬æ¬¡åŠ å…¥åŠŸèƒ½å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

  1. å¯ä»¥å¡«åŠ å¤šä¸ªåŸºé‡‘[æœ€å¤šä¹ä¸ª]
  2. å®ç°é˜ˆå€¼æé†’åŠŸèƒ½
  3. å¤šä¸ªåŸºé‡‘è½®æµæ˜¾ç¤º
  4. å¢åŠ ä¸Šè¯æŒ‡æ•°å’Œé»„é‡‘9999 çš„æ˜¾ç¤º

è®¾ç½®æ“ä½œå±•ç¤º

æœ€ç»ˆæ•ˆæœå±•ç¤º

é˜ˆå€¼æé†’å±•ç¤º

è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯æé†’å±•ç¤º

ç¨‹åºå·²ç»æ‰“åŒ…å¥½äº†ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿å¤§å®¶ä¸‹è½½å°è¯•ã€‚ä»»åŠ¡æ æ’ä»¶ï¼Œç¨‹åºä¸­ç”¨åˆ° yjg30737 çš„ pyqt-toast çš„æç¤ºæ¡†ã€‚ç”±äºè¿™ä¸ªå¼¹çª—ä½ç½®æ˜¯åŸºäºçˆ¶ç±»çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯¹ä»–çš„ä»£ç æœ‰æ‰€ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚

0.æˆæœ

ä½¿ç”¨PyQt5æ¥åšç•Œé¢å¼€å‘ï¼Œå®‰è£…ä½¿ç”¨å¯ä»¥å‚çœ‹è¿™è¾¹çš„æ•™ç¨‹PyQt5å®‰è£…ä»¥åŠä½¿ç”¨æ•™ç¨‹åˆé›†(2022)ã€‚ä¸»è¦æ˜¯æŠŠè¿™ä¸ªå°æ’ä»¶æ”¾åˆ°ä»»åŠ¡æ ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å¯ä»¥éšæ—¶çœ‹åˆ°ã€‚å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®åˆ·æ–°é¢‘ç‡å’Œå¢åŠ åˆ å‡åŸºé‡‘ã€‚æˆæœå›¾æ˜¯è¿™æ ·çš„ï¼Œçœ‹èµ·æ¥è¿˜æ˜¯ä¸é”™çš„ã€‚

1.ä»£ç 

import sys, requests, time, win32gui, jsonimport win32api, win32confrom PyQt5.QtCore import *from PyQt5.QtGui import *from PyQt5.QtWidgets import *import pickleimport osimport base64from functools import partialfrom pyqt_toast import Toastfrom Toast import TimerMessageBoximg_minus = b''img_settings = b''img_logout = b''img_plus = b''img_clock = b''img_disk = b''class BackendThread(QObject):    # é€šè¿‡ç±»æˆå‘˜å¯¹è±¡å®šä¹‰ä¿¡å·    update_date = pyqtSignal(str)    fundCodes = []    interval = 10    fzkey = 0    fzval = 0    fzfh = 0    currentPage = 1    pageCount = 0    fzlist = ['dwjz', 'gsz', 'gszzl']    au9999 = {}    sh000001 = {}    if not os.path.exists('db.pkl'):        try:            file = open('db.pkl', 'w')            file.close()        except:            win32api.MessageBox(0, "æ— æ³•åˆ›å»ºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ²¡æœ‰æƒé™ï¼è¯·æ£€æŸ¥", "æé†’", win32con.MB_OK)            sys.exit()    if os.path.getsize('db.pkl') > 0:        pkl_file = open('db.pkl', 'rb+')        fundCodes, interval, fzkey, fzval, fzfh = pickle.load(pkl_file)        pkl_file.close()    def run(self):        while 1:            t = time.time()            json_content = []            status = "ok"            msg = "success"            headers = {                'Host': 'hq.sinajs.cn',                'Referer': 'https://finance.sina.com.cn/realstock/company/sh000001/nc.shtml'            }            ##  ã€‘ä¸Šè¯æŒ‡æ•°            apiUrl = "https://hq.sinajs.cn/rn=" + str(int(t)) + "&list=s_sh000001"            try:                retstr = requests.get(apiUrl, headers=headers).text                #print(retstr)                retArrtmp = retstr.split('"')                retArr = retArrtmp[1].split(",")                self.sh000001 = {                    "name": retArr[0],                    "price": retArr[1]                }            except:                print('è·å–ä¸Šè¯æŒ‡æ•°å¼‚å¸¸')            ## é»„é‡‘            apiUrl = "https://api.jijinhao.com/quoteCenter/realTime.htm?codes=JO_71&_=" + str(int(t))            try:                retstr = requests.get(apiUrl).text                retstr = retstr.replace("var quote_json =", "")                jsonData = json.loads(retstr)                self.au9999 = {                    "name": jsonData["JO_71"]["showName"],                    "price": jsonData["JO_71"]["q5"]                }            except:                print('è·å–é»„é‡‘å¼‚å¸¸')            data_ret = {                "status": status,                "reminder": {                    "fzkey": self.fzlist[self.fzkey],                    "fzval": self.fzval,                    "fzfh": self.fzfh                },                "reference": {                    "AU9999": self.au9999,                    "SH000001": self.sh000001                },                "msg": msg,                "data": json_content            }            data_count = len(self.fundCodes)            limit = 3            if (int(data_count % limit) == 0):                self.pageCount = int(data_count / limit)            else:                self.pageCount = int(data_count / limit) + 1            if self.currentPage > self.pageCount:                self.currentPage = 1            start_index = (self.currentPage - 1) * limit            last_limit = 9999            if self.currentPage == self.pageCount:                last_limit = data_count % limit  # æœ€åä¸€é¡µçš„æ•°æ®æ¡æ•°            if last_limit != 9999:                limit = last_limit                end_index = start_index + limit            end_index = start_index + limit            list = self.fundCodes[start_index:end_index]            for fundcode in list:                apiUrl = "http://fundgz.1234567.com.cn/js/" + fundcode + ".js?rt=" + str(int(t))                try:                    retstr = requests.get(apiUrl).text                    retstr = retstr.replace("jsonpgz(", "").replace(");", "")                    jsonData = json.loads(retstr)                    json_content.append(jsonData)                except requests.exceptions.ConnectionError:                    #print('ConnectionError -- please wait 3 seconds')                    data_ret["status"] = "no"                    data_ret["msg"] = "ç½‘ç»œå¼‚å¸¸...."                    time.sleep(3)                except requests.exceptions.ChunkedEncodingError:                    #print('ChunkedEncodingError -- please wait 3 seconds')                    data_ret["status"] = "no"                    data_ret["msg"] = "ç½‘ç»œå¼‚å¸¸...."                    time.sleep(3)                except:                    #print('Unfortunitely -- An Unknow Error Happened, Please wait 3 seconds')                    data_ret["status"] = "no"                    data_ret["msg"] = "ç½‘ç»œå¼‚å¸¸...."                    time.sleep(3)            #print(json.dumps(data_ret, indent=2))            self.update_date.emit(json.dumps(data_ret, indent=2))            self.currentPage = self.currentPage + 1            time.sleep(self.interval)    def set_interval(self, value):        self.interval = value    def set_fundCodes(self, value):        self.fundCodes = value    def set_fzkey(self, value):        self.fzkey = value    def set_fzval(self, value):        self.fzval = value    def set_fzfh(self, value):        self.fzfh = valueclass SetDialog(QWidget):    def __init__(self):        super(SetDialog, self).__init__()        self.backendSD = ""        self.init_ui()    def init_ui(self):        self.setFixedSize(210, 170)        self.setWindowTitle('è®¾ç½®')        fund_codes = []        interval1 = 10        fzkey = 0        fzval = 0.3        fzfh = 0        self.setWindowFlags(Qt.FramelessWindowHint)        if os.path.getsize('db.pkl') > 0:            pkl_file = open('db.pkl', 'rb+')            fund_codes, interval1, fzkey, fzval, fzfh = pickle.load(pkl_file)            pkl_file.close()        # -------- æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´        self.interval = QLabel(self)        self.interval.setText("åˆ·æ–°æ—¶é—´:")        self.interval.setGeometry(10, 5, 60, 20)        pngData = base64.b64decode(img_settings)        pix = QPixmap()        pix.loadFromData(pngData)        self.setWindowIcon(QIcon(pix))        self.val = QLabel(self)        self.val.setText(str(interval1) + "s")        self.val.setGeometry(185, 5, 60, 20)        self.sld = QSlider(Qt.Horizontal, self)        self.sld.setMinimum(10)        self.sld.setMaximum(180)        self.sld.setValue(interval1)        self.sld.setGeometry(70, 5, 110, 20)        self.sld.valueChanged[int].connect(self.changevalue)        # --------åŸºé‡‘åˆ—è¡¨æ“ä½œ        self.fundlist = QLabel(self)        self.fundlist.setText("åŸºé‡‘åˆ—è¡¨:")        self.fundlist.setGeometry(10, 35, 60, 20)        self.listView = QListWidget(self)        self.listView.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOff)        for code in fund_codes:            self.listView.addItem(code)        self.listView.setGeometry(70, 35, 55, 65)        self.code = QLineEdit(self)        self.code.setPlaceholderText("åŸºé‡‘ä»£ç ")        reg = QRegExp('[0-9]{6}$')        validator = QRegExpValidator(self)        validator.setRegExp(reg)        self.code.setValidator(validator)        self.code.setGeometry(135, 50, 70, 20)        self.minus = QPushButton(self)        pngData = base64.b64decode(img_minus)        pix = QPixmap()        pix.loadFromData(pngData)        self.minus.setIcon(QIcon(pix))        self.minus.setIconSize(QSize(15, 15))  # è®¾ç½®iconå¤§å°        self.minus.setGeometry(160, 75, 15, 15)        self.minus.setFlat(True)        self.minus.clicked.connect(self.minus_fund)        self.plus = QPushButton(self)        pngData = base64.b64decode(img_plus)        pix = QPixmap()        pix.loadFromData(pngData)        self.plus.setIcon(QIcon(pix))        self.plus.setIconSize(QSize(15, 15))        self.plus.setGeometry(185, 75, 15, 15)        self.plus.setFlat(True)        self.plus.clicked.connect(self.add_fund)        # --- è®¾ç½®æé†’åŠŸèƒ½        self.btnclock = QPushButton(self)        pngData = base64.b64decode(img_clock)        pix = QPixmap()        pix.loadFromData(pngData)        self.btnclock.setIcon(QIcon(pix))        self.btnclock.setFlat(True)        self.btnclock.setGeometry(5, 110, 20, 20)        self.remind = QLabel(self)        self.remind.setText("æé†’:")        self.remind.setGeometry(25, 110, 60, 20)        self.cb = QComboBox(self)        self.cb.addItems(['å•ä½å‡€å€¼', 'ä¼°ç®—å‡€å€¼', 'ä¼°ç®—æ¶¨å¹…'])        self.cb.setCurrentIndex(fzkey)        # 'QWidget{background-color:rgb(0,0,0)}'        self.cb.setStyleSheet("QComboBox::drop-down{border:none;background: transparent; }\                              QComboBox::down-arrows{border:none; background: transparent;}\                              QComboBox::down-arrow:pressed { background: transparent; }")        self.cb.setGeometry(55, 110, 75, 20)        self.cb1 = QComboBox(self)        self.cb1.addItems(['>=', '<='])        self.cb1.setCurrentIndex(fzfh)        self.cb1.setStyleSheet("QComboBox::drop-down{border:none;background: transparent; }\                                      QComboBox::down-arrows{border:none; background: transparent;}\                                      QComboBox::down-arrow:pressed { background: transparent; }")        self.cb1.setGeometry(135, 110, 35, 20)        self.fz = QLineEdit(self)        self.fz.setPlaceholderText("é˜ˆå€¼")        self.fz.setText(str(fzval))        reg = QRegExp('^(\-|\+)?\d+(\.\d+)?$')        validator = QRegExpValidator(self)        validator.setRegExp(reg)        self.fz.setValidator(validator)        self.fz.setGeometry(175, 110, 30, 20)        self.btn = QPushButton('ä¿å­˜', self)  # è®¾ç½®æŒ‰é’®å’ŒæŒ‰é’®åç§°        pngData = base64.b64decode(img_disk)        pix = QPixmap()        pix.loadFromData(pngData)        self.btn.setIcon(QIcon(pix))        self.btn.setGeometry(90, 140, 50, 20)  # å‰é¢æ˜¯æŒ‰é’®å·¦ä¸Šè§’åæ ‡ï¼Œåé¢æ˜¯æŒ‰é’®å¤§å°        self.btn.clicked.connect(self.slot_btn_function)  # å°†ä¿¡å·è¿æ¥åˆ°æ§½        self.btnclose = QPushButton('å…³é—­', self)  # è®¾ç½®æŒ‰é’®å’ŒæŒ‰é’®åç§°        pngData = base64.b64decode(img_logout)        pix = QPixmap()        pix.loadFromData(pngData)        self.btnclose.setIcon(QIcon(pix))        self.btnclose.setGeometry(150, 140, 50, 20)  # å‰é¢æ˜¯æŒ‰é’®å·¦ä¸Šè§’åæ ‡ï¼Œåé¢æ˜¯æŒ‰é’®å¤§å°        self.btnclose.clicked.connect(self.close_setting)  # å°†ä¿¡å·è¿æ¥åˆ°æ§½    def close_setting(self):        self.close()    def changevalue(self, value):        self.val.setText(str(value) + "s")    def minus_fund(self):        item = self.listView.currentItem()        self.listView.takeItem(self.listView.row(item))    def add_fund(self):        if self.code.text() == "":            return        if self.listView.count() < 9:            if self.listView.selectedItems():                self.listView.insertItem(self.listView.currentIndex().row(), self.code.text())            else:                self.listView.addItem(self.code.text())            self.code.setText("")        else:            QMessageBox.warning(self, "è­¦å‘Š", "ç›®å‰åªèƒ½æ·»åŠ ä¹åªåŸºé‡‘ï¼", QMessageBox.Cancel)    def slot_btn_function(self):        # print(self.sld.value())        widgetres = []        # è·å–listwidgetä¸­æ¡ç›®æ•°        count = self.listView.count()        # éå†listwidgetä¸­çš„å†…å®¹        for i in range(count):            widgetres.append(self.listView.item(i).text())        # print(widgetres)        self.backendSD.set_fundCodes(widgetres)        self.backendSD.set_interval(self.sld.value())        self.backendSD.set_fzkey(self.cb.currentIndex())        self.backendSD.set_fzfh(self.cb1.currentIndex())        self.backendSD.set_fzval(self.fz.text())        pickle_file = open('db.pkl', 'wb')        pickle.dump((widgetres, self.sld.value(), self.cb.currentIndex(), self.fz.text(), self.cb1.currentIndex()), pickle_file)        pickle_file.close()        self.close()class TaskWidget(QWidget):    fzdcit = {'dwjz': "å•ä½å‡€å€¼", 'gsz': "ä¼°ç®—å‡€å€¼", 'gszzl': 'ä¼°ç®—æ¶¨å¹…'}    def __init__(self):        super().__init__()        self.setWindowFlags(Qt.WindowStaysOnTopHint | Qt.FramelessWindowHint)        m_hTaskbar = win32gui.FindWindow("Shell_TrayWnd", None)        m_hBar = win32gui.FindWindowEx(m_hTaskbar, 0, "ReBarWindow32", None)        # m_hMin = win32gui.FindWindowEx(m_hBar, 0, "MSTaskSwWClass", None)        b = win32gui.GetWindowRect(m_hBar)  # è·å–m_hBarçª—å£å°ºå¯¸bä¸º[å·¦ï¼Œä¸Šï¼Œå³ï¼Œä¸‹]çš„æ•°ç»„        self.setGeometry(b[2] - b[0] - 250, 0, 250, b[3] - b[1])        win32gui.SetParent(int(self.winId()), m_hBar)  # è®¾ç½®ä»»åŠ¡æ ä¸ºæ­¤çª—å£çš„çˆ¶çª—å£        self.setContextMenuPolicy(Qt.CustomContextMenu)        self.customContextMenuRequested.connect(self.create_rightmenu)  # è¿æ¥åˆ°èœå•æ˜¾ç¤ºå‡½æ•°        label1 = QLabel(self)        label1.setAlignment(Qt.AlignLeft)        label1.setObjectName("label1")        label1.setGeometry(0, 1, 250, 50)        label1.setText("è¯·å³å‡»è®¾ç½®æ·»åŠ åŸºé‡‘")        label1.setToolTip("Loading.....")        label2 = QLabel(self)        label2.setAlignment(Qt.AlignLeft)        label2.setObjectName("label2")        label2.setGeometry(0, 14, 250, 50)        label2.setText("è¯·å³å‡»è®¾ç½®æ·»åŠ åŸºé‡‘")        label2.setToolTip("Loading.....")        label3 = QLabel(self)        label3.setAlignment(Qt.AlignLeft)        label3.setObjectName("label3")        label3.setGeometry(0, 27, 250, 50)        label3.setText("è¯·å³å‡»è®¾ç½®æ·»åŠ åŸºé‡‘")        label3.setToolTip("Loading.....")        self.groupBox_menu = QMenu(self)        pngData = base64.b64decode(img_settings)        pix = QPixmap()        pix.loadFromData(pngData)        self.actionA = QAction(QIcon(pix), u'è®¾ç½®', self)        pngData = base64.b64decode(img_logout)        pix = QPixmap()        pix.loadFromData(pngData)        self.actionB = QAction(QIcon(pix), u'é€€å‡ºç¨‹åº', self)        self.thread = QThread()        self.backend = BackendThread()        self.backend.update_date.connect(self.handleDisplay)        self.backend.moveToThread(self.thread)        self.thread.started.connect(self.backend.run)        self.thread.start()    def exitapp(self):        app = QApplication.instance()        app.quit()    def setting(self):        self.settingDialog = SetDialog()        self.settingDialog.show()        self.settingDialog.backendSD = self.backend    def create_rightmenu(self):        #print("create_rightmenu")        #self.actionA.setShortcut('Ctrl+S')  # è®¾ç½®å¿«æ·é”®        self.groupBox_menu.addAction(self.actionA)  # åŸºé‡‘åˆ—è¡¨        self.groupBox_menu.addAction(self.actionB)  # æ›´æ–°é¢‘ç‡        self.actionA.triggered.connect(self.setting)        self.actionB.triggered.connect(self.exitapp)        self.groupBox_menu.popup(QCursor.pos())    def changeContent(self, text, timer):        toast = Toast(text=text, duration=2)        toast.show()        toast.setPosition(QPoint(self.x() + 90, self.y() - 20))        timer.stop()        timer.deleteLater()        pass    def handleDisplay(self, data):        # æ›´æ–°åŸºé‡‘ä¿¡æ¯        # print("handleDisplay:" + time.strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S", time.localtime()))        num = 0        timeTick = 0        jsonDatas = json.loads(data)        if jsonDatas["status"] != "ok":            for i in range(1, 4):                label = self.findChild(QLabel, "label" + str(i))                label.setAlignment(Qt.AlignLeft)                label.setText(jsonDatas["msg"])                label.setStyleSheet('color: blue')            return        fzkey = jsonDatas["reminder"]["fzkey"]        fzval = jsonDatas["reminder"]["fzval"]        fzfh = jsonDatas["reminder"]["fzfh"]        auname = jsonDatas["reference"]["AU9999"]["name"]        auprice = jsonDatas["reference"]["AU9999"]["price"]        shname = jsonDatas["reference"]["SH000001"]["name"]        shprice = jsonDatas["reference"]["SH000001"]["price"]        for jsonData in jsonDatas["data"]:            label = self.findChild(QLabel, "label" + str(num + 1))            label.setAlignment(Qt.AlignLeft)            gszzl = jsonData['gszzl']            fundcode = jsonData['fundcode']            name = jsonData['name']            dwjz = jsonData['dwjz']            gsz = jsonData['gsz']            gztime = jsonData['gztime']            if fzfh == 0:                if float(jsonData[fzkey]) >= float(fzval):                    msgtext = name + " | åŸºé‡‘" + self.fzdcit[fzkey] + "æ¶¨åˆ°é˜ˆå€¼[ " + fzval + " ]äº†ï¼"                    timer = QTimer()                    timer.timeout.connect(partial(self.changeContent, msgtext, timer))                    timer.start(3000 * int(timeTick))                    timeTick = timeTick + 1            else:                if float(jsonData[fzkey]) <= float(fzval):                    msgtext = name + " | åŸºé‡‘" + self.fzdcit[fzkey] + "è·Œåˆ°é˜ˆå€¼[ " + fzval + " ]äº†ï¼"                    timer = QTimer()                    #print(timeTick)                    timer.timeout.connect(partial(self.changeContent, msgtext, timer))                    timer.start(3000 * int(timeTick))                    timeTick = timeTick + 1            label.setText(gszzl + " | " + fundcode + " - " + name)            label.setToolTip(auname + " : " + str(auprice) +                             "\n" + shname + "  : " + shprice +                             "\n----------------------------" +                             "\n" + fundcode + " - " + name +                             "\nå•ä½å‡€å€¼: " + dwjz +                             "\nå‡€å€¼ä¼°ç®—: " + gsz +                             "\nä¼°ç®—æ¶¨å¹…: " + gszzl +                             "\næ›´æ–°æ—¥æœŸ: " + gztime)            gsz = float(gszzl)            if gsz < 0:                label.setStyleSheet('color: green')            else:                label.setStyleSheet('color: red')            num = num + 1        for i in range(num, 3):            label = self.findChild(QLabel, "label" + str(num + 1))            label.setText("å»è®¾ç½®æ·»åŠ åŸºé‡‘....")            label.setStyleSheet('color: black')if __name__ == '__main__':    app = QApplication(sys.argv)    ex = TaskWidget()    ex.show()    sys.exit(app.exec_())

2.æ€»ç»“

ä¸Šæ¬¡è¯´åˆ°ä¸æƒ³ç”¨åˆ«äººçš„å›¾åºŠï¼Œè¿™è¾¹åšå®¢æ›´æ–°è®°å½•å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ç°åœ¨å°±è¦ç»™ä»–å®‰æ’ä¸Šäº†ã€‚å‡†å¤‡è‡ªå»ºçš„å›¾åºŠæ”¾ç½®ä¸€äº›ç§äººçš„å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œæ— å…³ç´§è¦çš„è¿˜æ˜¯æ”¾åˆ°å…¬å…±çš„å›¾åºŠä¸Šã€‚

0.å›¾åºŠæ­å»º

æ™šä¸Šæ£€ç´¢ä¸‹ç¾¤æ™–å›¾åºŠä¼šæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šç»“æœï¼Œè¿™è¾¹é€‰æ‹©äº†æ¯”è¾ƒç®€æ´çš„Lycheeï¼ŒGitHubåœ°å€åœ¨è¿™ç…§ç€æ•™ç¨‹æ­èµ·æ¥å°±è¡Œã€‚è¿™æ¬¡ä¸»è¦çš„ä»»åŠ¡åœ¨äºhttpsè®¿é—®ï¼Œè¿™è¾¹åšä¸ªè®°å½•ğŸ“ã€‚

1.å¢åŠ Httpsè®¿é—®

æ­å»ºå¥½çš„æ˜¯ä¸èƒ½é€šè¿‡httpsè®¿é—®çš„ï¼Œåˆ«é—®æˆ‘æ€ä¹ˆçŸ¥é“çš„ã€‚ä¸‹é¢å°±å¼€æ•´ï¼Œè®©å®ƒè·‘èµ·æ¥
é¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦æœ‰è¯ä¹¦ï¼Œè¿™è¾¹ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯Letâ€™s Encrypt çš„å…è´¹è¯ä¹¦ï¼Œåç¡•è·¯ç”±é‡Œæœ‰è¿™ä¸ªè®¾ç½®ï¼Œä¼šå¸®åŠ©è‡ªåŠ¨æ›´æ–°çš„ã€‚

è¯ä¹¦åˆ°æ‰‹ï¼Œç°åœ¨å¼€å§‹å»æ•´Lycheeä¸Šçš„Nginx
# 1ã€æŸ¥å‡ºè¿è¡Œçš„å®¹å™¨$ sudo docker ps -aCONTAINER ID   IMAGE                                     COMMAND                  CREATED        STATUS                    PORTS                                         NAMES5bee8392f00a   lycheeorg/lychee:latest                   "/entrypoint.sh nginx"   7 days ago     Up 17 hours (healthy)     0.0.0.0:6883->80/tcp, 0.0.0.0:6884->443/tcp   lycheeorg-lychee# 2ã€è¿›å…¥å®¹å™¨å¼€æ•´$ sudo docker exec -it 5bee8392f00a /bin/bash
æ–°å¼€ä¸€ä¸ªæ ‡ç­¾æŠŠè¯ä¹¦æ‹·åˆ°å®¹å™¨é‡Œ
# 1ã€è·å¾—å®¹å™¨çš„é•¿ID$ sudo docker inspect -f '{{.ID}}' lycheeorg-lychee5bee8392fdedeede8646334743875634563457435cb1# å…ˆåˆ°è¯ä¹¦å­˜æ”¾çš„ç›®å½•ï¼Œç„¶åæ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤sudo docker cp cert_key.tar 5bee8392fdedeede8646334743875634563457435cb1:/etc/nginx/cert# æŸ¥çœ‹å®¹å™¨sudo docker ps# è¿›å…¥å®¹å™¨sudo docker exec -it 5bee8392f /bin/bash# è¿›å…¥ç›¸åº”ç›®å½•cd /etc/nginx/cert# è§£å‹è¯ä¹¦tar -xvf cert_key.tar# é‡æ–°è½½å…¥é…ç½®nginx -s reload
è¯ä¹¦å°±ä½ï¼Œå¼€å§‹æ•´é…ç½®

é…ç½®è·¯å¾„åœ¨ /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
è¿™è¾¹ä¿®æ”¹å°†80çš„é…ç½®ä¿®æ”¹æˆ443çš„ï¼Œç„¶åæ·»åŠ 80é‡å®šå‘åˆ°443çš„é…ç½®å³å¯ã€‚é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å®Œæ•´å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

user www-data;worker_processes auto;daemon off;error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log;events {    worker_connections  1024;}http {    include       mime.types;    default_type  application/octet-stream;    log_format  main  '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '                      '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '                      '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"';    access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;    sendfile        on;    keepalive_timeout  65;    # By default, if the processing of images takes more than 60s,    # a 504 Gateway timeout occurs, so we increase the timeout here    # to allow procesing of large images or when multiple images are    # being processed at the same time. We set max_execution_time    # below to the same value.    fastcgi_read_timeout 3600;    # We also set the send timeout since this can otherwise also cause    # issues with slow connections    fastcgi_send_timeout 3600;    gzip  on;    server {listen 80;server_name your.domain.com; return 301 https://$host$request_uri;     }    server {        root /var/www/html/Lychee/public;listen 443 ssl;         server_name your.domain.com;         ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/cert/cert.pem;         ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/cert/key.pem;         ssl_session_timeout 5m;        ssl_protocols TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3;         ssl_ciphers ECDHE-RSA-AES128-GCM-SHA256:HIGH:!aNULL:!MD5:!RC4:!DHE;         ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on;        client_max_body_size 100M;                # serve static files directly        location ~* \.(jpg|jpeg|gif|css|png|js|ico|html)$ {            access_log off;            expires max;            log_not_found off;        }        # removes trailing slashes (prevents SEO duplicate content issues)        if (!-d $request_filename)        {            rewrite ^/(.+)/$ /$1 permanent;        }        # If the request is not for a valid file (image, js, css, etc.), send to bootstrap        if (!-e $request_filename)        {            rewrite ^/(.*)$ /index.php?/$1 last;            break;        }        location / {            index  index.php            try_files $uri $uri/ /index.php?$query_string;        }        # Serve /index.php through PHP        location = /index.php {            fastcgi_split_path_info ^(.+?\.php)(/.*)$;            try_files $uri $document_root$fastcgi_script_name =404;            # Mitigate https://httpoxy.org/ vulnerabilities            fastcgi_param HTTP_PROXY "";            fastcgi_pass unix:/run/php/php8.1-fpm.sock;            fastcgi_index index.php;            fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name;            fastcgi_param PHP_VALUE "post_max_size=100M                max_execution_time=3600                upload_max_filesize=100M                memory_limit=256M";            fastcgi_param PATH /usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin;            include fastcgi_params;        }        # Deny access to other .php files, rather than exposing their contents        location ~ [^/]\.php(/|$) {            return 403;        }    }    include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;}

ä¹‹å‰httpçš„åè®®åœ¨httpsçš„åšå®¢ä¸Šä¼šè¢«è‡ªåŠ¨å‡çº§æˆhttpsè®¿é—®ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å›¾åºŠåˆä¸æ”¯æŒï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å›¾ç‰‡ä¼šæŒ‚æ‰ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç°åœ¨å°±èƒ½å¤Ÿæ„‰å¿«çš„ç©è€äº†ã€‚
